quote: She thought, I need no cup. I am Chalice. I am filling with the grief and hurt and fear of my demesne; the shattered earthlines weigh me down; I am brimming with the needs of my people.
quote_letters: SHE THOUGHT I NEED NO CUP I AM CHALICE I AM FILLING WITH THE GRIEF AND HURT AND FEAR OF MY DEMESNE THE SHATTERED EARTHLINES WEIGH ME DOWN I AM BRIMMING WITH THE NEEDS OF MY PEOPLE
